style: professional dark-mode data visualization, OG social card format
scene: A sleek dark analytics dashboard showing a dramatic upward traffic curve. The chart line glows blue (#5B8AEF). Small medical aesthetics icons (syringe, face outline) are subtly visible in the background. The number +340% is prominently displayed in large white text near the peak of the chart. Clean sans-serif typography. Dark charcoal background (#0a0a0a) with subtle grid lines. Modern, minimal, premium feel.
